channel.title: [TUT]Adding Downloaded Models[TUT]
channel.description:
Hello and welcome to Ollys-B-J's Modeling Guide. In this guide I will show you how to add downloaded models into a client capible of installing Models.
Difficulty: 4/10(Moderate) Needed Files: All included In My Package
First of all I recommend you download my Modeling Starter pack. [U][B] DOWNLOAD:[/B][/U] [IMG]http://img235.imageshack.us/img235/373/virusscancompletelr7.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://uppit.com/5JA13M"] OLLYSMODELINGPACK[/URL]
Now once that has downloaded extract it to somewhere.
[U]Step 1:[/U] Open the file inside my pack called Godsword. In there you will see 140001.dat and 1400012.dat These DAT files are models but they are not ready to be added yet. First we need to gzip them, so hold shift and drag your mouse over them now when they are both highlighted drag them onto the program named GZIP in there as shown in the picture below. [IMG]http://img77.imageshack.us/img77/442/gzipingis8.png[/img]
[U]Step 2:[/U] Now you should have 2 new files in your godsword folder Rename the one called 460012.dat to 460012 Rename the one called 460001.dat to 460001 the reason we need to get rid of the .dat part is because The numbers are the model NUMBER so you cant have letters. Now Hold shift and copy them both. [U] Step 3:[/U] Now open the Modeling Client also found in my pack, Then Goto Models Delete every thing in there because i forgot to empty it out lol, After the modeling folder is empty paste the 2 Files you copied earlier in here. [U] Step 4:[/U] Go back again and Open class8.java if you have never opend a .java file before click open with Then Notepad. Because this source already has a Godsword in it we shall add another bud called somethign else lol:p Press CTRL+F And Find Godsword Under the [CODE]class8.aByteArray178 = "A great weapon, used by the best warriors.".getBytes(); }[/CODE]
Paste This(I have labeled every thing for you): [CODE] if(i == 134567){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";//Caption to click when you want to wield it. class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];(item origional Colour) class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1];(item origional Colour) class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0;(item changed Colour) class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0;(item Changed Colour) class8.anInt174 = 140012;//item Drop Model id (140012) class8.anInt181 = 1957;//Zoom Number class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 484; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 140001;//Male Model id (140001) class8.anInt200 = 140001;//Female Model ID This will be 140001 class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Item Name ";//Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "Examin Item Text Goes Here".getBytes();// Examin Text }[/CODE] Now save and Close window.
Now run Compile.bat(make sure you have jdk1.6.0_7 if you dont have a look for compilers for your java verion) After it has compiled open Run.bat
[U]Step 5:[/U] Now your client will open log into any server and type these exactally as ive typed them into the chat box: [CODE]add model 140012 add model 140001[/CODE]
[U]Step 6:[/U]
Restart your client and play on a server of which you can spawn and type ::item134567
Congratulations you have added a model! Hope this helped thanks for reading if you need any help PM me.:lol:

nice tut, just have 1 thing wrong with it, you tell the person to find a compiler with their java version when they could just edit compiler with notepad and tell it to look for their version of java, all compilers are the same its just they look for your java in differnt places

item.title: [TUT]Adding Downloaded Models[TUT]
item.dc:creator: @Olly-B-J Olly-B-J
item.description:
@Olly-B-J wrote:

Hello and welcome to Ollys-B-Jâ€™s Modeling Guide.
In this guide I will show you how to add downloaded models into
a client capible of installing Models.

Difficulty: 4/10(Moderate)
Needed Files: All included In My Package

First of all I recommend you download my Modeling Starter pack.

DOWNLOAD:


OLLYSMODELINGPACK

Now once that has downloaded extract it to somewhere.

Step 1:
Open the file inside my pack called Godsword.
In there you will see 140001.dat and 1400012.dat
These DAT files are models but they are not ready to be
added yet. First we need to gzip them, so hold shift and drag your mouse
over them now when they are both highlighted drag them onto the
program named GZIP in there as shown in the picture below.

Step 2:
Now you should have 2 new files in your godsword folder
Rename the one called 460012.dat to 460012
Rename the one called 460001.dat to 460001
the reason we need to get rid of the .dat part is because
The numbers are the model NUMBER so you cant have letters.
Now Hold shift and copy them both.

Step 3:
Now open the Modeling Client also found in my pack,
Then Goto Models Delete every thing in there because i forgot
to empty it out lol, After the modeling folder is empty paste
the 2 Files you copied earlier in here.

Step 4:
Go back again and Open class8.java
if you have never opend a .java file before click
open with Then Notepad.
Because this source already has a Godsword in it we
shall add another bud called somethign else lol:p
Press CTRL+F And Find Godsword
Under the

class8.aByteArray178 = "A great weapon, used by the best warriors.".getBytes(); }

Paste This(I have labeled every thing for you):

if(i == 134567){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";//Caption to click when you want to wield it. class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];(item origional Colour) class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1];(item origional Colour) class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0;(item changed Colour) class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0;(item Changed Colour) class8.anInt174 = 140012;//item Drop Model id (140012) class8.anInt181 = 1957;//Zoom Number class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 484; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 140001;//Male Model id (140001) class8.anInt200 = 140001;//Female Model ID This will be 140001 class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Item Name ";//Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "Examin Item Text Goes Here".getBytes();// Examin Text }
Now save and Close window.

Now run Compile.bat(make sure you have jdk1.6.0_7 if you dont have a look for compilers for your java verion)
After it has compiled open Run.bat

Step 5:
Now your client will open log into any server and type these exactally as ive typed them into the chat box:

add model 140012 add model 140001

Step 6:

Restart your client and play on a server of which you can spawn and type ::item134567

Congratulations you have added a model!
Hope this helped thanks for reading if you need any help PM me.:lol:

Read full topic
